typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Name as string,
		State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(Column_3 = add(Name,State),
		{DLTA-test} = iif(startsWith(Name,"test"), "Test", "NotTest"),
		{DLTA-contains} = iif(instr(Name,"test") >0, "Test", "NotTest")) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Name as string,
		State as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['output.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
